message: In this day and age of law firm marketing, it’s all about finding the right angle to set you apart from the competition. What if we told you the key to that angle is you? Join us to learn how your own charisma is your greatest marketing tool, and how utilizing your persona both online and in-person can take your business to new heights.

You’re invited to join guest speakers Marc Halpert and Scott Mason as they share the value of charisma in both your in-person and online presence for driving your business. Charisma In-Person and On LinkedIn: Business Development for Attorneys begins promptly at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT on Thursday, February 22, 2024.
bottomline: Seats are limited, so reserve yours today!
